articles.description: Team GB athletes return to the UK "exhausted but happy" after collecting 65 medals at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Paris Olympics: Team GB athletes return home from 2024 Games

articles.description: Julian Alvarez completes £81.5m move to Atletico Madrid after two years at Manchester City.
articles.title: Julian Alvarez: Atletico Madrid sign Manchester City striker for £81.5m

articles.description: Valentina Petrillo is set to become the first openly transgender athlete to compete at the Paralympic Games, having been selected to represent Italy in Para-athletics in Paris.
articles.title: Valentina Petrillo: Italian sprinter set to be first transgender Paralympian

articles.description: Former England and Surrey batter Graham Thorpe, who died last week aged 55, took his own life, his family said.
articles.title: Graham Thorpe: Former England batter took his own life, family says

articles.description: Newcastle United have made a third bid of around £60m to sign Marc Guehi from Crystal Palace, while Wilfried Zaha could return on loan and Eagles reject £20m Fulham bid for Joachim Andersen.
articles.title: Marc Guehi: Newcastle make third bid for Crystal Palace defender

articles.description: Tom Daley has announced his retirement from diving after winning a silver medal at the Paris Games.
articles.title: Tom Daley announces retirement from diving

articles.description: Tom Cruise descends from the Stade de France roof as stars of sport, screen and music bring Paris 2024 to a spectacular conclusion.
articles.title: Paris Olympics closing ceremony: 2024 Games end at Stade de France

articles.description: Trent Alexander-Arnold will once again be a key player for Liverpool this season, but what is his best position?
articles.title: Liverpool: Trent Alexander-Arnold - what is his best position?

articles.description: The Mission: Impossible star, known for his love of stunts, wowed the Stade de France.
articles.title: Tom Cruise abseils off stadium roof in daring Olympic finale

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at the best stats from the 2024 Paris Games
articles.title: Paris Olympics: The best stats from the 2024 Games
